statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase' AND amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT transaction_date) AS unique_dates FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING unique_dates > 2
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_email ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 AND customer_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase' GROUP BY customer_name, transaction_date ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(transaction_id) as total_transactions FROM customers LEFT JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_transactions > 3 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, flag FROM fraud_detection WHERE flag = 'fraudulent' AND description LIKE '%suspicious%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number='1234567890'
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE flag='flagged'
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE customer_id='11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111'
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%')
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, transaction_amount FROM customers c INNER JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
